name: Project Echo (Zero_Zero)
description:
Detective Dan Dixon: a top well-renowned Detective in the Australian NSWPD. Dan Dixon has the extraordinary power to reverse time to discover new clues that were previously unattainable; but with this power comes a disadvantage: as Dan uses his powers he begins to forget things that have happened in the past, the diagnosis being severe memory loss and brain damage. Dan is working the night shift one night when a new case file comes across his desk,  Dan sets out late at night to try and get a head start on his new case. When Dan arrives he finds the body of the victim in the basement of his house, as Dan delves further into his investigation things start to change and soon he finds out why the case was assigned to him… 

Project Echo sets you in the shoes of a Detective; trapped in a basement you must discover and solve the case of a Murder using your extraordinary powers to help. Solve puzzles, experience the horrors and discover the truth behind the murder in PROJECT ECHO.
